name: Wild Deer hunting 2017 - Safari Sniper Shooting 3D
name_original: Wild Deer hunting 2017 - Safari Sniper Shooting 3D
description:
Wild Deer hunting Challenge-3D Snipper shooting

The deer hunting craze is at its peak, so its time to grab all the guns and equipments and prepared you for the deer hunting in the valley. As the season is on! So go for hunting as many deer as you can to become the ultimate deer hunter and get rewards.
You have to be a best deer hunter to get highest number of Deer in the limited time. Plot it tactically without alerting the surrounding deer and other wild animals, otherwise deer will run and wild animals will attack on you.
This deer hunting game doesn't force you to buy weapons and guns from money, so just go for deer hunting with sniper and keep on deer hunting for earning dummy cash which will let you unlock all other weapons or guns level by level. The deer hunting game is most addictive, attractive and amazing game of the new year 2017 with full of challenges in the most realistic 3D jungle environment with realistic wild animals, jungle trees, water lakes, mountains, grass and much more.
While hunting the deer, be careful from other wild beast animals which can kill you. Their each attack would lower your health and eventually you will be dead. So kill all wild animals before they reach you. These beasts include lions, chimpanzees, hippopotamus, rhino etc. In each level complexity is increased by more no number of deer and other wild animals. You have to hunt the deer the in limited time otherwise you will lose the game or wild animals will kill you inhumanly. So be quick and precise to hunt the deer before you are killed by jungle beasts.
Features of Deer Hunting
o Realistic forest environment
o Action packed missions in the jungle full of wild animals
o Full range of jungle animals to hunt including deer!
o REAL 3D Graphics and sounds
o Multiple weapons with quick change abilities
o Great Deer Hunting Experience
o Multiple gameplay missions with different tasks.
So, don’t waste your time and get it now from iTunes store for ultimate fun of shooting and hunting.
